report.title: Waste of Time and Money
report.author: JayZ_50
report.bodytext: Me and two of my buddies each took 5 grams of these mushrooms, which came from one of our good friends. They were ordered from a retailer in Indiana, who was selling them as poisonous non-consumables. We took them at about 6:00 PM, I crushed mine up and mixed them with applesauce, and my buddies preferred to just munch them down. We waited with much anticipation for about an hour, while just chilling out. /n /n After about an hour, my friend told me that my pupils looked a little big, but I felt normal. We went back and took 3g more, in hopes that this would start the trip. Nothing happened whatsoever. There was a period of about 30 minutes, when we where outside smoking a cigarette, where we noted that we all felt 'cracked out,' as if we were on the downside of a trip. There was never any body buzz, auditory or visual halucinations, or any sense of trippin. The only noted side effect was stomach cramps, and rank gas. What a waste of money in my opinion. I have tried mushrooms,exstacy, cocaine, and marijuana before and had great times. The experience produced no desireable results at all. A fuckin waste of money and time. I'll stick to my other drugs and the mushrooms that make me trip, none of this feeling sick or cracked out bullshit.
